name: Palette, A Tale of Kulrz
description:
Welcome to the world of Palette! The people of each Kulr(pronouced Kuh-ler!) have their own special way of life, their own unique culture, and each thrives in their own little ways. 

But not everything is sunshine and kulr scales... a husband and wife from different Kulrs, the taboos of Null and Void, and the myth of the Gray King all await you in this massive RPGMaker project! Currently under development, more to come soon...
